snippet: The deal, which is expected to close by the end of the year, will help Cisco expand its video offerings as it works to bolster lagging growth in its core networks business.
abstract: The deal, which is expected to close by the end of the year, will help Cisco expand its video offerings as it works to bolster lagging growth in its core networks business.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and MARK SCOTT

headline.main: Cisco to Buy NDS, a Video Services Firm, for $5 Billion
headline.print_headline: Cisco to Buy NDS, a Software Provider, Expanding Its Video Services
